title: Easy to Love You
description: Hunter McCormick finally has the love of his life by his side.. That is, until a horrible accident finds those dreams hanging by a thread. Secrets begin to surface as their lives change. These revelations could prove to either be the downfall of Hunter and MacKenzie or the catalyst that strengthens their bond.Now, Hunter has a choice to make.He can choose to trust that MacKenzie can handle his past or move mountains to make sure she never finds outâ€¦
author: Megan   Smith
